Joel Silent Voices Tanakh

Chapters

  • Joel 1
  • Joel 2
  • Joel 3
  • Joel 4
1 And it shall come to pass afterward, that I will pour out My spirit upon all flesh; and your daughters and your sons shall prophesy, your old women shall dream dreams, your young women shall see visions; 2 And also upon the servants and upon the houseboys in those days will I pour out My spirit.
3 And I will shew wonders in the heavens and in the earth, blood, and fire, and pillars of smoke. 4 The sun shall be turned into darkness, and the moon into blood, before the great and terrible day of the Domina come.
